text: Elizabeth Santos Leal de Carvalho (May 5, 1946 â€“ April 30, 2019), known professionally as Beth Carvalho, was a Brazilian samba singer, guitarist, cavaquinist and composer. She was born in Rio de Janeiro. Her works mainly focused on the indigenous people of Brazil. Carvalho died of problems caused by a staph infection on April 30, 2019 in Rio at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Brazilian guitarists Category:Musicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Singers from Rio de Janeiro
title: Beth Carvalho
